Vlad looks at her with a disgusted stare.

Vlad: I assume I am a prisoner if I am in a cell, quiaff? What for?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> OOC: Gah, stupid net connection ...
> 
> Phoenix shies away even though she knows Vlad can't get at her 
> through the bars.  "Hey, cool down," she pleads.  "You'll just get 
> yourself into trouble acting like that.  Anyway, I think that's how 
> Predacons operate as a rule."
> 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > The shock is more than what Vlad can take anymore. His eyes open 
> > wide 
> > > as he recognize there the description of his so-called friend. 
He 
> > > stands up and looks at Phoenix.
> > > 
> > > Vlad: WHAT? STRAVAG FREEBIRTH! I'LL KILL HER WITH MY BARE HANDS! 
> > SHE 
> > > IS THE ONE WHO TRIED TO HELP ME AND SHE BETRAYED BOTH ME AND 
> > TYRAEL! 
> > > SHE IS WORTH NOTHING MORE THAN A STRAVAG SHPEROID!
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > > Now it's Phoenix's turn to think.  "About your height, pretty, 
> > with 
> > > > three dragon heads sticking out of her back, I think."
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > > Vlad thought for a moment.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Vlad: I don't know any Starstorm. What did she look like?
> > > > > 
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > > > > "You're in a cell in the Predacon base," Phoenix explains. 
 
> > She 
> > > > > looks 
> > > > > > around, a bit embarrased.  "I can't tell you WHERE in the 
> > > > base, 'cuz 
> > > > > > I'm kinda lost ... again.  A girl named Starstorm brought 
> you 
> > > > here. 
> > > > >  
> > > > > > That's all I know."
